element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm calculates the least frequent value at each cell in a set of raster layers.
In case of ambiguity (for instance, if there are two values that appear the same number of times), the nodata value is assigned to the cell.

element.name: NODATA
element.text: if this option is selected, the presence of a cell with no data value will cancel the calculation and assign the same no data value to the result cell. If this is not selected, cells with no data value will be ignored and the rest with valid data will be computed.
